Body:
with TemporaryDirectory() as tmpdir:
    tr, sh, fs, sv, bv = self.test_get_shap(trait_name, classifier_type)
    sh.add_feature_data(sample_names=[x.identifier for x in tr], features=
        fs, shaps=sv, base_value=bv)
    for record in tr:
        sh.plot_shap_force(record.identifier)
        out_path = Path(tmpdir) / '_'.join(['testing_force_plots',
            f'{record.identifier}_force_plot.png'])
        out_path.parent.mkdir(exist_ok=True)
        plt.savefig(out_path)
        plt.close(plt.gcf())
    assert len(list(Path(tmpdir).glob('*.png'))) == 3
pytest.mark.parametrize('trait_name', trait_names, ids=trait_names)pytest.mark.parametrize('classifier_type', classifier_ids, ids=classifier_ids)
